jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description:
The leader in real-time TV ad data and analytics is currently seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing Engineering team. We have a product that is changing how brands, agencies and networks measure and assess the impact of TV advertising campaigns. Our software uses proprietary audio and video analysis to monitor and extract TV commercials, movie trailers and other promotional... content from TV.

We are looking for someone that is highly motivated and knows how to get things done quickly and efficiently. We are not looking for a coding robot – we are looking for someone that’s highly creative and has an insatiable appetite for learning new things and accomplishing challenging goals in a fast moving (and not always structured) environment.

As a software engineer on the TV Conversions team, you will deal with big data encompassing TV advertisement impressions, web site click streams, and other ad impression and user behavior data sources.

Responsibilities will include:
• Developing and building features using our client’s conversion tracking data in conjunction with our Smart TV impression data.
• Working with very large data sets from both internal and 3rd party data
• Building algorithms that properly analyze, match and store data from multiple sources
• Integrate monitoring tools that improve application visibility
• Analyze, design and code improvements to scale performance as the amount of data grows
• Develop new capabilities and features around attribution of consumer actions in response to TV commercials.

Besides being highly motivated and valuing the equity opportunity, we are looking for someone that has:
• BS degree in Computer Science or equivalent job experience.
• In depth knowledge and 5+ years of experience using Java and Object Oriented programming.
• Strong knowledge and experience with Java, Spring, and SQL.
• Experience with relational databases like MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle, etc.
• Experience with Amazon Redshift, Map Reduce, Spark, and Python is a plus.
• Experience with LiveRamp, Oracle BlueKai, Neustar, or other DMPs is a plus.
• Experience in problem solving and finding issues
• Knowledge of best practices of software development including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations.

iSpot.TV is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard for race, color, religion, sex, age, disability, military status, or national origin or any other characteristic protected under federal, state, or applicable local law

jobs.title: Lead Software Developer (Web API, Backend)
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Lead Software Developer to join our Technology team at Total Wine & More . You will develop software applications based on functional requirements and technical specifications following these applications through to implementation. Our Developers work in an Agile environment collaborating with Business Analysts, QA Engineers and other developers to share coding best... practices, working to ensure standardized techniques across the development team. You will work with Microsoft technologies including .NET, SQL Server, in the Azure cloud. You will report to the Senior Manager, Software Development.

You will
• Work with a variety of teams across the Technology department to evaluate, estimate, develop and create high impact projects on schedule
• Perform solution analysis, translating requirements into design specifications
• Implement applications and services using Azure, .NET/C#, and Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft SQL Server, publisher/subscriber messaging systems
• Contribute to design/architecture of technical solutions
• Identify and evaluate new technologies for implementation
• Consult with end-user to prototype, refine, test, and debug solutions

You will come with
• Bachelor's Degree or equivalent years' of experience in the .NET framework
• 10+ years' experience in Microsoft .NET Framework and .NET Core
• 8+ years' experience in Microsoft SQL Server
• Experience with RESTful APIs and microservices using .NET and C#
• Experience designing complex software architectures that use design patterns and object-oriented techniques
• Proficiency with Object Oriented programming, Design Patterns
• Experience in Test-Driven Development and test automation
• Experience with infrastructure as code, zero downtime deployments, continuous integration / continuous deployment (CI/CD
